name: tailscale.dnp.dappnode.eth
description: Tailscale is a mesh VPN alternative that makes it easy to connect your devices securely.
author: DAppNode Association <admin@dappnode.io> (https://github.com/dappnode)

warnings.onMinorUpdate: When updating or reinstalling Tailscale, a new auth key might be required if the previous one is no longed valid (expired). You can check your current auth key status in the [Tailscale Admin Settings](https://login.tailscale.com/admin/settings/keys). If you encounter issues, generate a new auth key and update it in your Dappnode's Tailscale package settings. For more information see https://docs.dappnode.io/docs/user/access-your-dappnode/vpn/tailscale
